answers.answer: I'm due February 26, but I'm having my babyshower January 17. My mom says its better to have it a month or so earlier, so you could see what you received for the baby and see what you still might need especially if you're a first time mommy like me. aha (:
Due christmas day and baby sshower is next week. I will be about 32 weeks. It will beat holidays and travel and it will give me lots of time to get organized and finish getting anything I need :-)
Makes sence! Thanks me too first time mom and so excited!
Aww due Christmas day thats beutiful yes better before the holidays cuz everyone will be busy or traveling
Goodluck & congrats btw (:
Thanks:) goodluck to you too:) what are you having:)?
You welcome & thank you (: they couldn't tell last time I went on Oct 3, so hopefully I find out today :D I want a boy though lol
Your welcome:) and aww how many ultrasounds have u had? Realy lol Hope u get the boy:)

Personally I think its better to have sooner than later so you have plenty of time to save and buy whatever wasn't given to you but I also am the type of person who likes to prepare. Pregnant with my third right now and with my first I had my baby shower at 6 months.
So far just 3 and I'm 21 weeks and 1 day, so today will be 4. Thanks (:
For my first, I had mine around 33 or 34 weeks. I figured I wanted early enough so I had time to buy anything else I needed, and in case I went into labor earlier than expected.
Thanks girl I guess 29 not that bad ill try to wait till 30 weeks though. Realy almost 4 I had two so far n I think thats it:/ were are you from?
I'm due February 10th and I have a baby shower October 26th in Minnesota and November 23rd in Kentucky. I have to have it early because of the traveling and I'm not going to travel after winter hits.

I'm due February 14, having my baby shower November 29, after Thanksgiving. Having it early because i do have Preeclampsia and doctors say i might not pass 35 weeks. So my opinion, in any pregnancy anything can happen. so two months before your due date should be good :)
I'm 31 weeks, and my baby shower is this weekend
Also I'm due December 16th but my husband and I think we are hoping to have our son soon las the November or early December

I'm having mines at 26 weeks . :/ kind of early but I wanted to do it the day after my birthday.  Baby shower Dec 6 & Due date March 13th.  It depends on you and whats your reasoning.  Some ppl tell me have it a week before I'm due because what I'd something goes wrong and I'm like I'm not going to think negative only positive . and congrats btw
Yeah I've gone 4 times and get an ultrasound every time. I'm from Los Angeles, I go to Kaiser in West LA

I'm due January 11th I'm having one on the first of November & one on the fifteenth of November.. Due to all the holidays so I think yur doing it at a goof time. I'll have my first one at 30 weeks & 2nd at like 33weeks
At 32 weeks**

question: Is having a babyshower at 29 weeks to early? Due to all the holidays and weather coming up I want to do it before it gets to cold. And my due date is january 19 When are yall having yalls babyshower?
title: babyshower
